rules.natural: Provided that garbage truck 7 is assigned to route A, route A is completed in the morning shift.
If the recycling process was updated last quarter, then whenever it complies with regulation 15B, it is certified to the eco‑standard.
Assuming the recycling process was audited last quarter, it follows that it was updated last quarter.
Under the condition that plastic bale 23 is inspected by supervisor Jones, it is approved by supervisor Jones.
Either plastic bale 23 is inspected by supervisor Jones or it is inspected by technician Smith.
If plastic bale 23 is inspected by technician Smith, then in case it contains contaminants, it is suitable for remanufacturing.
Provided that plastic bale 23 is approved by supervisor Jones, then if it contains contaminants, it is suitable for remanufacturing.
Either plastic bale 23 is quarantined or it does not contain contaminants.
Plastic bale 23 is hazardous, or else it is not quarantined.
In the event that plastic bale 23 contains organic waste, it is not hazardous.
Plastic bale 23 contains organic waste, or it contains metal shards.
Should plastic bale 23 contain metal shards, it is not hazardous.
If garbage truck 7 is on time for the morning shift, then it is assigned to route A.
Whenever there is a malfunction of the compactor on garbage truck 7, garbage truck 7 is overloaded.
If there is a traffic jam on highway 5 during the morning shift, then whenever garbage truck 7 is overloaded, it is rerouted to the backup route.
Either there is a traffic jam on highway 5 during the morning shift, or there is roadwork on Elm Street during the morning shift.
If a detour is active on Elm Street during the morning shift, then whenever garbage truck 7 is overloaded, it is rerouted to the backup route.
When standard operations are in effect at the sorting facility, emergency protocol is not activated at the sorting facility.
In the event that garbage truck 7 is delayed for the morning shift, it is assigned to route A.
Provided that plastic bale 23 contains contaminants, it is not suitable for remanufacturing.
Plastic bale 23 contains contaminants, or else garbage truck 7 is on time for the morning shift, or garbage truck 7 is delayed for the morning shift.
Should plastic bale 23 be rejected during quality check, it does not contain contaminants.
Whenever plastic bale 23 is sent to the landfill, it is rejected during quality check.
The recycling process complies with regulation 15B, or plastic bale 23 is processed at the sorting facility, or plastic bale 23 does not contain contaminants.

In case it is not true that if there is roadwork on Elm Street during the morning shift then a detour is active on Elm Street during the morning shift, emergency protocol is activated at the sorting facility.
If garbage truck 7 is not assigned to route A, then there is a malfunction of the compactor on garbage truck 7.
Provided that garbage truck 7 is not assigned to route A, it is not rerouted to the backup route.
